Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to correct certain erosion problems along the banks of the Warrior River near Moundville, Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to take necessary measures to control streambank erosion on the Warrior River in order to protect Mound State Park, Alabama. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to correct certain erosion problems along the banks of the Warrior River near Moundville, Alabama.
